title: NIT Rourkela Recruitment 2026 - Apply Offline for Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: National Institute of Technology Rourkela (NIT Rourkela) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech in Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the NIT Rourkela Recruitment 2026 . Here we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. If you are looking for more, here ...
